cast.name: 尤丽娅·索恩采娃 Yuliya Solntseva
伊戈尔·伊林斯基 Igor Ilyinsky

writer.name: 阿列克谢·法克 Aleksei Fajko
费奥多尔·奥采普 Fyodor Otsep

director.name: 尤里•热利亚布日斯基 Yuri Zhelyabuzhsky

introduction: As she works in her tedious office job, Maria Ivanovna dreams about being married, and she has particular hopes that her co-worker Nikodim Mityushin will take an interest in her. Nikodim, though, is in love with Zina, who sells cigarettes on the sidewalk, and he frequently buys cigarettes from her even though he does not smoke. One day, a film crew uses Zina as an extra in an outdoor scene, and the cameraman, Latugin, falls in love with her. Latugin soon arranges an acting job for Zina. To complicate matters further, Zina has yet another admirer in Oliver MacBride, an American businessman who is visiting Moscow. Written by Snow Leopard
